body:
So you might notice that some of the mods around have a new skin. That is because I was really bored in my computer class one day and decided to make myself an Avicus Hoodie skin. Soon a couple of the mods and a random teamspeak user (Cinnamon) also got one! Here is a link that will show you what the hoodie looks like: http://minecraft-skin-viewer.com/player/rileguy?r=1 . If you would like one, you MIGHT not have to wait much longer because I am going to be giving 5 of you the skin for free!! Now here is how you enter:

Skype: 
IGN:
Your Favorite Star Wars Character: 
Your Favorite Video Game of All Time:
Why The Skin Would Look Good On You:

I will be selecting 5 winners by Saturday and messaging them on skype, as well as posting on the forums. THIS WILL BE RANDOM. The answers you give are just for fun so we can learn a little bit about each other. I am willing to make the sweatshirts other colors, but within reason. 

I can't wait to see them on 5 new users! Good Luck!

P.S: This is the first big news announcement that I am giving this week. Hopefully The second one will be on Sunday. :]
